essential_properties.name: siteId
essential_properties.description: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to add to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: collectionId
essential_properties.description: ID of the collection to add an item to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: live
essential_properties.description: Whether the item should be published on the live site

essential_properties.name: siteId
essential_properties.description: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: collectionId
essential_properties.description: ID of the collection whose items to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: itemId
essential_properties.description: ID of the item to operate on

essential_properties.description: ID of the site containing the collection whose items to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.description: ID of the collection whose items to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
